Trade/Device Name(s): CDC Human Influenza Virus Real-Time RT-PCR Diagnostic Panel, Influenza A Subtyping Kit (VER 2)
Submitter Information: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
Regulation Name(s): Respiratory viral panel multiplex nucleic acid assay
Reagents for detection of specific novel influenza A viruses
Specimen Container(s): Virus transport medium containing human A549 cells
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Applied Biosystems (ABI) 7500 Fast Dx Real-Time PCR instrument
Method(s)/Technology(ies): Oligonucleotide primers and fluorescently labeled hydrolysis probes
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for CDC Human Influenza Virus Real-Time RT-PCR Diagnostic Panel, Influenza A Subtyping Kit (VER 2) for subtyping seasonal influenza A viruses using rRT-PCR
Indications for Use Summary: Determines the subtype of seasonal human influenza A viruses (A(H3) and/or A(H1)pdm09) in upper and lower respiratory tract specimens and viral culture using real-time RT-PCR, aids surveillance of circulating influenza viruses
